title: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-featured e-commerce platform built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include product listings, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing.

title: Task Management App
description: A productivity application for managing tasks and projects. Built with React, TypeScript, and Firebase with real-time updates and team collaboration features.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A modern weather application that provides detailed forecasts, interactive maps, and location-based services using various weather APIs.

title: Personal Blog Platform
description: A customizable blog platform with markdown support, tag management, and user authentication. Features a modern, responsive design and SEO optimization.
